name: Kia Sonet
description: The price of Kia Sonet, a 5 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 7.99  - 15.75 Lakh. It is available in 28 variants, with engine options ranging from 998 to 1493 cc and a choice of 3 transmissions: Manual, Clutchless Manual (IMT) and Automatic. Sonet comes with 6 airbags. Kia Sonet is available in 11 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17.5 kmpl for Sonet.
